attributes.title: Insulting
attributes.review: First thing I saw when opening the app was a rapist.. oh wait I mean the president.. get those switched up.. Anyways it was so disgusting my cat actually had to get admitted into vet due to it choking on its own throw up after viewing this image. I demand that my vet bill be fully paid and the app gets taken down for the safety of others. Don’t do this to people it’s wrong🤢🤮

attributes.title: extremely and utterly TRAUMATIZING😳😔
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and the second i opened it, i was greeted with a link to rat porn and mr. trump receiving a pedicure. the app then asked me to allow notifications and i clicked “don’t allow”... two minutes later the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) burst into my home and sucker-punched my mother square in her jaw. she is now going to be needing jaw reconstruction surgery. i would not recommend.

attributes.title: would NOT recommend
attributes.review: as a young liberal of the next generation, i wanted to see what donnie’s game plan was and how he would achieve ‘winning’ this years election. but when i opened the app, it crashed immediately and had changed my wallpaper to a horrific picture of some sort of orange chip getting a spray tan NAKED? society does NOT need that in their lives and this app NEEDS to be taken down.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: First off I have to say What a horrible app!! I downloaded this thinking my big hero trump but kid you not there was a huge Cheeto on the screen! I was absolute terrified !! This app makes me want to throw up!! I can’t look at it for another second !! Like who is that Cheeto making “ America great again” no ! Just the absolute worst never downloading again get this app banned

attributes.title: DO NOT USE THIS APP ✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of getting real, up to date information. After downloading and opening the first thing it asks is for you to enter your phone number,  after I did this step my phone closed the app and it hasn’t opened since. My phone has all been glitching and randomly shutting off. PLEASE remove this App!!!!

attributes.title: RACIST APP
attributes.review: So when i downloaded this app my PHONE TURNED ORANGE! And said “i have the curse of Trump!” and i was so confused, then Trump came out and pimp slapped me and said i was his and started to whip me and called me the “N word!” and he wouldn’t stop at all, but when i asked him to stop he got super mad and he pulled out his tongue and bugs started to crawl out of there. so i deleted the app, and everything went back to normal.

attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: All this app does is freeze! It even deletes itself everyday. It’s so annoying and the app made my phone turn off on. It wasn’t until I deleted the app that my phone was working again. This app possessed my phone and as a Catholic I’m completely offended by the unholy spirit that possessed my phone. The only exorcism that worked was deleting the app.

attributes.title: I don’t like you trump
